ygData.subject: Re: Stop song
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/9/00 11:39:04 PM Pacific Standard Time, everquest@eidosnet.co.uk writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/9/00 11:39:04 PM Pacific Standard Time,
everquest@... writes:

<< Has anyone had any luck at all getting the /stopsong command to work?
I was fighting in Unrest last night (note to self, never ever go there
again!) and managed to get my song stuck a number of different times
(sigh). And of course my party is asking for the healing song in down
time, and I would have loved to. Except I'm stuck playing binding and
daren't move in case I bring the whole house down on us! >>

Just start and stop the several quickly several times, this ALWAYS works.

Ren
